sqlMap.update: UPDATE HTLD_NTIC_DTLS_F N SET RCIV_DT = (SELECT RCVD_DT FROM REV_COLL_F R WHERE R.PRT_AT_CODE = '622' AND N.CHRGE_KND_CD = R.WORK_CODE AND N.ACCNUT_YEAR = R.FISCAL_YR AND N.NTIC_NO = R.BILL_NO), RCIV_SE = (SELECT RCVD_TP FROM REV_COLL_F R WHERE R.PRT_AT_CODE = '622' AND N.CHRGE_KND_CD = R.WORK_CODE AND N.ACCNUT_YEAR = R.FISCAL_YR AND N.NTIC_NO = R.BILL_NO) WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM REV_COLL_F R WHERE R.PRT_AT_CODE = '622' AND N.CHRGE_KND_CD = R.WORK_CODE AND N.ACCNUT_YEAR = R.FISCAL_YR AND N.NTIC_NO = R.BILL_NO AND N.RCIV_SE='0' )

UPDATE HTLD_NTIC_DTLS_F N SET RCIV_SE = ( SELECT DLY_RCVD_TP FROM UNPAID_F U WHERE U.PRT_AT_CODE = '622' AND GAM_GET_HTLD_ARRRG_CHRGE_KND(N.CHRGE_KND_CD) = U.WORK_CODE AND N.ACCNUT_YEAR = U.FISCAL_YR AND N.NTIC_NO = U.BILL_NO AND U.DLY_SER_NO = (SELECT MAX(DLY_SER_NO) FROM UNPAID_F D WHERE D.PRT_AT_CODE = '622' AND GAM_GET_HTLD_ARRRG_CHRGE_KND(N.CHRGE_KND_CD) = D.WORK_CODE AND N.ACCNUT_YEAR = D.FISCAL_YR AND N.NTIC_NO = D.BILL_NO) ), RCIV_DT = ( SELECT DLY_RCVD_DT FROM UNPAID_F U WHERE U.PRT_AT_CODE = '622' AND GAM_GET_HTLD_ARRRG_CHRGE_KND(N.CHRGE_KND_CD) = U.WORK_CODE AND N.ACCNUT_YEAR = U.FISCAL_YR AND N.NTIC_NO = U.BILL_NO AND U.DLY_SER_NO = (SELECT MAX(DLY_SER_NO) FROM UNPAID_F D WHERE D.PRT_AT_CODE = '622' AND GAM_GET_HTLD_ARRRG_CHRGE_KND(N.CHRGE_KND_CD) = D.WORK_CODE AND N.ACCNUT_YEAR = D.FISCAL_YR AND N.NTIC_NO = D.BILL_NO) ) WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM UNPAID_F U WHERE U.PRT_AT_CODE = '622' AND GAM_GET_HTLD_ARRRG_CHRGE_KND(N.CHRGE_KND_CD) = U.WORK_CODE AND N.ACCNUT_YEAR = U.FISCAL_YR AND N.NTIC_NO = U.BILL_NO AND N.RCIV_SE = '1' )
